text:
Palo Alto, CA.

You- Senior rails dev w/ mysql experience. Must have gone to University(CS degree not necessary). Preference if you have worked at a startup before. You enjoy small teams and working on something really exciting. (our team will always remain small). No perks, no big paycheck. Generous options and an ability to help shape the company as it grows.

email your resume and samples of your work/projects to: schoolishteam@gmail.com
